entry.title: [RBX][VOIP] Carrier SIP
entry.content:
Mar 7, 18:10 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 07/03/2022 08:30 UTC
End Time : 07/03/2022 08:41 UTC
Service impact : Outgoing calls to Carrier SIP RBX were not available
Root Cause : A DNS latency on our cluster impacted outgoing calls routing via Carrier SIP RBX. Carrier SIP SBG was fully available during the incident, SBG region was able to handle customer outgoing calls. We plan to strengthen DNS caching for both Carrier SIP zones to improve our service resilience.

entry.title: [FR][xDSL/FTTH] - Loss of connectivity
entry.content:
Mar 3, 16:18 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 02/03/2022 01:00 UTC
End Time : 03/03/2022 16:01 UTC
Service impact : We do not encounter any disruption on the national network

Mar 2, 09:59 UTC
Monitoring - The server is available again and we are seeing a resolution of the requests. We invite you to restart your modem if you do not see any improvement.

Root cause : The incident is due to an unavailable Kosc login server.

The incident will be monitored for the next 24 hours to confirm full resolution.

Mar 2, 08:35 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Mar 2, 07:48 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 02/03/2022 01:00 UTC
